card.name: Grid-Tie Inverter Charger
card.description: This module handles all power stages for single-phase bidirectional AC/DC battery charging (filtering, precharge, PFC, transformer, and step down). Ideal for domestic wallbox chargers, it supports vehicle-to-grid and works as a generic AC/DC isolated supply with premium efficiency.

header.title: Grid-Tie Inverter Charger
header.name: ADM-PC-VG11
header.description: Connecting the electric grid to a high voltage battery pack. It's ideal for vehicle-to-grid DC chargers or residential energy storage. It integrates an active front-end rectifier, isolated DC/DC, and DC/DC converter in one compact unit.

hardwareDescription: The VG11 power module is a highly versatile bidirectional 11kW AC/DC converter designed for a wide range of applications, offering a **bidirectional power flow** for seamless energy transfer. With an **output voltage range of 0 to 920V** and **current range of 0 to 30A**, the VG11 is capable of delivering high power while maintaining a **peak efficiency of over 96%**, making it ideal for energy-efficient systems.

Its **input voltage range of 100-240VAC** and ability to handle up to **48A input current** provide flexibility for different power grids, while its broad **AC mains frequency range of 45-65 Hz** ensures compatibility across regions. The VG11 is built with robust **protection features**, including overcurrent, overvoltage, overtemperature, and hardware interlock, ensuring safe and reliable operation in demanding environments.

The VG11 power module is an ideal solution for **bidirectional wallboxes.** With its wide **voltage range (0-920V)** covering all the CCS range, it natively supports both **400V and 800V EVs**. Its **bidirectional power flow** makes it ideal for **Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G)** applications, providing reliable, efficient energy transfer for modern EVs.
